name: Redbeard 2077
description:
• The game features a variety of detailed environments all relating back to the concept of a space pirate from the distant moons holding the stronghold of another pirate to a monument to our need for wanton destruction taking the form of a post-apocalyptic city, and finally a forgotten cave filled with treasure.
  • Levels can be accessed in any order.
  • Choose whether to soar above the ground, or blaze a trail right through with varied but quick and fluent movement style, including a dash, double jump, and wall running.
  • Use your trusty flintlock to both keep yourself safe and influence the world around you.

     Redbeard 2077 is a dystopian third person shooter game which follows main character Redbeard as they traverse treacherous terrains, shoot out zombies and scallywags, and recover engine parts in this thrilling game created by Pegleg Parrots Studios.

     You are awoken to an explosion on your ship as you are scouting where to venture out next. You look out the window and realize your ship has been hit by a passing comet and has hit your engine directly. You exit the ship and examine the damages and can see 3 missing pieces of the engine for you to be able to get the engine running and to get you back to safety. In Redbeard 2077, all engine parts have tracking devices in them so you are able to locate the 3 missing pieces on the 3 surrounding worlds you were contemplating to discover.
